data.title: Rainfall Summary
data.meta_description: LCRA’s Hydromet is a system of more than 275 automated river and weather gauges throughout the lower Colorado River basin in Texas. The Hydromet provides near-real-time data* on streamflow, river stage, rainfall totals, temperature and humidity.
data.text:
Data is automatically displayed and subject to revision.
